meanings.definition: A large Arctic mammal with shaggy fur and curved horns.
meanings.sent1: The muskoxen roamed the snowy tundra in search of food.
meanings.sent2: We saw a herd of muskoxen grazing peacefully in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The muskoxen decided to have a dance-off to show off their shaggy fur.
meanings.sent4: The muskoxen's curved horns gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of strength.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the muskoxen's shaggy fur and curved horns left a lasting impression on us.
